channel.title: Templates on Fannypack
channel.description: Recent content in Templates on Fannypack

item.title: Base
item.description: Base template Default layout, header and a .container for your content. Selector Description .container Required First child in .main-content. Has a max-width. <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en" class="no-js"> <head>...</head> <body> <header class="site-header">...</header> <main class="main-container" role="main"> <div class="main-content"> <div class="container"> ... </div> </div> </main> </body> </html>

item.title: Drawer
item.description: Drawer template Example template with a drawer. A drawer is an (auto-) collapsible sidebar with navigational elements. You see this pattern often in dashboards. Toggling the drawer is done with the checkbox hack Selector Description .layout--drawer Required On the html tag .layout--fixed-header Required On the html tag. .drawer__checkbox Required The checkbox hack .drawer__menu Required The clickbale region that holds the hamburger icon .

item.title: Fixed header
item.description: Fixed header template When scrolling the page, your header wil be fixed at the top and always visible. You can combine this with other .layout-- modifiers. So <html class="layout--drawer layout--fixed-header"> is valid and will work. Selector Description .layout--fixed-header Required On the html tag <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en" class="no-js layout--fixed-header"> <head>...</head> <body> <header class="site-header">...</header> <main class="main-container" role="main"> <div class="main-content"> <div class="container"> .

item.title: Login
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en" class="no-js layout--diorama"> <head>...</head> <body style="background-image: url('img/antelopecanyon.jpg');" data-copyright="Unsplash" data-credit="Ashim Dâ€™Silva"> <main class="main-container" role="main"> <div class="app-icon app-icon--xlarge app-icon--lumberjack-red" role="img" aria-labelledby="app-icon-name"> <div class="app-icon__logo" aria-hidden="true"> <span class="app-icon__character">T</span> <span class="app-icon__character">E</span> </div> <span class="app-icon__name" id="app-icon-name">Temptation Editor</span> </div> <p>Sign in below with your De Persgroep account.</p> <form action="" class="form"> <div class="form__group"> <label for="name" class="form__label">Name</label> <input id="name" name="name" type="text" class="form__field" required="required" /> </div> <div class="form__group"> <label for="password" class="form__label">Password</label> <input id="password" name="password" type="password" class="form__field" required="required" /> </div> <div class="form__group"> <div class="form__checkbox"> <label class="form__checkbox__label"> <input type="checkbox" class="form__checkbox__input" value="rememberme" />Remember me </label> </div> </div> <div class="form__actions"> <button class="button button--primary" type="submit">Login</button> </div> <div><a href="#">Forgot password</a></div> </form> <footer class="footer"> Experiencing problems or in need of assistance?

item.title: Two col
item.description: 2 col template 1 column for the main content and a sidebar for some complementary content about the main content. Sidebar Here some complementary info about the main article. <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en" class="no-js"> <head>...</head> <body> <header class="site-header">...</header> <main class="main-container" role="main"> <div class="main-content"> <div class="container"> <div class="grid"> <div class="col-8"> <!-- or any other .col-X --> </div> <div class="col-6"> <!-- or any other .col-X --> </div> </div> </div> </div> </main> </body> </html>
